Question: Partron Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Partron Co., Ltd.

CES 2024

- Partron Co., Ltd. showcased their latest product at CES 2024, featuring advanced noise-cancelling technology.
- The product offers a long-lasting battery life of up to 20 hours on a single charge.
- It is equipped with Bluetooth 5.0 for seamless connectivity and supports hands-free calling.
- The design focuses on comfort with soft ear cushions and an adjustable headband.
- The product also includes a built-in microphone for voice commands and calls.
